Neppure può darsi rilievo alla mancata costituzione in giudizio del Ministero trattandosi di

del procedimento amministrativo.
In assenza di notula, la cui mancata presentazione non esclude il potere-dovere del giudice di

the same legal framework, which regulates the time of the procedure that the Public Administration must guarantee, to
the organisation that the Administration is given for the examination of applications through
administrative means and that is obliged to adapt considering the flow of applications, in compliance with the principles of
efficiency and effectiveness of administrative action ex art. 97 Constitution.
Neither can the failure to bring the Ministry before the courts be taken into consideration, since this is a
neutral behaviour which does not imply recognition of the right and which indeed demonstrates the need
for the applicants to use the judicial route in view of their inaction, the obstacles and time involved
in the administrative procedure.
